Sentence.value: An epidural block is a numbing medicine given by injection (shot) in the back.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: An [[epidural block|C0002913]] is a numbing [[medicine|C0025118]] given by [[injection|C1533685]] (shot) in the back.

Sentence.value: An epidural block may also be used to reduce pain during surgery on the lower extremities.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: An [[epidural block|C0002913]] may also be used to reduce [[pain|C0030193]] during surgery on the lower extremities.

Sentence.value: If your labor slows down, your doctor can give you medication to speed up your contractions.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If your labor slows down, your [[doctor|C0031831]] can give you [[medication|C0013227]] to speed up your contractions.
